message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a price of $15,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth considerably more to me. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. While I understand the value of the product, I can only offer $10,500. I hope we can find a way to meet in the middle.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, I can't let this go for less than $12,000. This is my final offer.
